derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin perambulat- 'walked about', from the verb perambulare, from per- 'all over' + ambulare 'to walk'

entry.def: When someone perambulates, they walk about for pleasure.

means.word_mean: 1. make an official inspection on foot of (the bounds of a property);
